sentence: RELATED STORY: Republicans freaking out about Madison Cawthorn's allegations of 'cocaine' and 'orgies' RELATED STORY: Rep. Madison Cawthorn uses important veteran affairs committee hearing to clean a gun According to the report, Harp received $131,278 in 2021.
title: New report reveals Madison Cawthorn likely broke ethics rules with chief of staff's salary
